data.title: Experience Sports Resort in Arlington, TX
data.meta_description: Live! by Loews in Arlington, TX provides a luxury hotel room & suite experience for families, sports fans, and anyone near Globe Life Park & AT&T Stadium.
data.text:
Welcome to Live! by Loews - Arlington, TX

The first of its kind sports resort

Bringing an upscale hospitality experience to Arlington’s Entertainment District, our stylish resort destination offers unparalleled, easy access to Texas Rangers’ Globe Life Field, the Dallas Cowboys’ AT&T Stadium, the Esports Stadium Arlington & Expo Center, and more. With 35,000 square feet of indoor and outdoor space, our Live! by Loews - Arlington hotel is ideal for meetings and conventions, but also perfect for families, sports fans, and anyone looking for the true meaning of Texan hospitality.

Hotel Highlights

300 luxury guestrooms, including 23 suites, across 14 stories, all with floor-to-ceiling windows

More than 35,000 square feet of new meeting and event space

Winner, 2020 ConventionSouth Readers Choice Award

Outdoor infinity pool and pool bar SOAK, open seasonally

Cut & Bourbon restaurant with a focus on American classics and bourbon

Craft beer, cocktails, and shareable plates at the outdoor bar, Arlington Clover Club

River Market for handcrafted coffee plus grab-and-go items

Year-round exercise - download our running map

Private rooftop terrace

Fitness Center featuring Peloton

Conveniently located at Texas Live! , situated between Texas Rangers’ Globe Life Field and Choctaw Stadium, across from AT&T Stadium, and walking distance to Esports Stadium Arlington & Expo Center

We are a proud partner of the Texas Rangers Golf Course. Hit the links just 3 miles from our hotel.

Useful Information

Check-in: 4 PM | Check-out: 11 AM

Age of check-in: 18

Valet parking: $39 overnight

Self-parking: $29 including taxes - no in/out privileges

Event/game day parking: Rates fluctuate based on local events. Please call the hotel for exact parking rates.

Meetings + Events: learn more about the most exciting venue in Dallas–Fort Worth

Business center: 24 hours with a key card, the main floor near the lobby

Fitness center: 24 hours, 3rd floor

In-room dining: available Sunday - Thursday: 6am - 11pm & Friday - Saturday: 6am - 1:30am

Pet fee: $50 per stay

Chat Your Service: Need a restaurant reservation or the AC turned up? Just text us and we’ve got you covered

Conveniently located on the Arlington Trolley line

Conveniently located to the University of Texas at Arlington.

Smoking is prohibited in all guestrooms. Guests will be subject to a fine if found smoking.

To request a bill from a previous stay, please visit the My Bill page or email ssccustomerservice@loewshotels.com or contact us at 1 888-320-6065
